visualeditor:
The name of the VisualEditor extension.
{{Identical|VisualEditor}}
visualeditor-aliennode-tooltip: Tooltip for items that VisualEditor cannot edit
visualeditor-clearbutton-tooltip: Tooltip text for the clear styling button. This clears "styling" like bold or italics from the current selection, but not "formatting" like being a list, a heading or a table.
visualeditor-clipboard-paste-special: Label for paste as plain text command
visualeditor-commentinspector-edit: Label for the edit button in the comment inspector.
visualeditor-content-select-all:
Label for select all command.
{{Identical|Select all}}
visualeditor-contextitemwidget-label-sec:
Text explaining the action that takes place after clicking on a context item.
{{Identical|Edit}}
visualeditor-dialog-command-help-title:
Title for keyboard shortcuts help dialog.
{{Identical|Keyboard shortcut}}
visualeditor-dialog-error: Title text in a dialog error screen
visualeditor-dialog-error-dismiss:
Label text for button to dismiss an error message in a dialog.
{{Identical|Go back}}
visualeditor-dialog-language-auto-direct:
Label text for button to make language direction automatic.
{{Identical|Automatic}}
visualeditor-dialog-language-search-titl:
Title for language search dialog
{{Identical|Select language}}
visualeditor-dimensionswidget-px:
{{optional}}
Label for the dimensions properties denoting pixel units.
visualeditor-dimensionswidget-times:
{{optional}}
Label for the dimensions properties denoting 'by', as in width x height.
visualeditor-find-and-replace-find-text:
Label for find text in find and replace
{{Identical|Find}}
visualeditor-find-and-replace-match-case: Label for match case toggle in find and replace
visualeditor-find-and-replace-regular-ex:
Label for regular expression toggle in find and replace
{{Identical|Regular expression}}
visualeditor-find-and-replace-replace-al: Label for replace all button in find and replace
visualeditor-find-and-replace-replace-bu:
Label for replace button in find and replace
{{Identical|Replace}}
visualeditor-find-and-replace-replace-te:
Label for replace text in find and replace
{{Identical|Replace}}
visualeditor-find-and-replace-results:
Label for find results showing how many results were found ($2), and which one is currently highlighted ($1)
{{Identical|Of}}
visualeditor-formatdropdown-format-block: Item in the formatting dropdown for block quote text. A block quote is a quotation which is a whole paragraph, or several paragraphs.
visualeditor-formatdropdown-format-headi:
Item in the generic formatting dropdown for a level 1 heading.
{{Identical|Heading}}

Item in the generic formatting dropdown for a level 2 heading.
{{Identical|Heading}}

Item in the generic formatting dropdown for a level 3 heading.
{{Identical|Heading}}

Item in the generic formatting dropdown for a level 4 heading.
{{Identical|Heading}}

Item in the generic formatting dropdown for a level 5 heading.
{{Identical|Heading}}

Item in the generic formatting dropdown for a level 6 heading.
{{Identical|Heading}}
visualeditor-formatdropdown-title: Tooltip text for the drop-down box for choosing the formatting style of the selected text, such as "Heading 1", "Heading 2" or "Plain text". (This is not related to "file format" or "data format", such as "Wikitext", "HTML", "PDF" etc.)
visualeditor-help-tool:
Title of popup tool in toolbar that provides help information.
{{Identical|Help}}
visualeditor-historybutton-redo-tooltip:
Tooltip text for the redo button.
{{Identical|Redo}}
visualeditor-historybutton-undo-tooltip:
Tooltip text for the undo button.
{{Identical|Undo}}
visualeditor-indentationbutton-indent-to: Tooltip text for list indent button
visualeditor-indentationbutton-outdent-t: Tooltip text for list outdent button
visualeditor-inspector-remove-tooltip:
Tooltip text for the button to remove an annotation in an inspector.
{{Identical|Remove}}
visualeditor-language-search-input-place: Placeholder text for language search widget.
visualeditor-languageannotation-descript:
Description of a language annotation

* $1 - Language autonym

Description of a language annotation with overridden directionality

* $1 - Language autonym
* $2 - Overridden direction (either LTR or RTL)
visualeditor-languageinspector-title:
Title of the language inspector dialog.
{{Identical|Language}}
visualeditor-languageinspector-widget-ch: Label for the language change button in the language inspector widget.
visualeditor-languageinspector-widget-la:
Label for the language inspector widget, to denote the text direction of the current element (left-to-right or right-to-left).
{{Identical|Direction}}

Label for the language inspector widget, to denote the current block language code.
{{Identical|Language code}}

Label for the language inspector widget, to denote the current block language.
{{Identical|Language}}
visualeditor-linkinspector-open:
Label for the button that opens the current link in a new window
{{Identical|Open}}
visualeditor-linkinspector-title:
Title of the link inspector dialog.
{{Identical|Link}}
visualeditor-listbutton-bullet-tooltip: Tooltip text for the bullet list button
visualeditor-listbutton-number-tooltip: Tooltip text for the numbered list button
visualeditor-mediasizewidget-button-orig: Label for the button that resizes a media item to its full original size (width and height).
visualeditor-mediasizewidget-label-custo:
Label for the media size widget custom size section.
{{Identical|Custom}}
visualeditor-mediasizewidget-label-defau: An error label notifying the user the size inputs are invalid.
visualeditor-mediasizewidget-label-scale:
Label for the media size widget scale section indicating a scaling of an image based on thumbnail size.

Translated in conjunction with: {{msg-mw|Visualeditor-mediasizewidget-label-scale}}: "Scale ____ % of thumbnail size", meaning the scale of the displayed image shall be x% of the default thumbnail size.
visualeditor-mediasizewidget-sizeoptions:
Label for the media size widget size select for custom size.
{{Identical|Custom}}

Label for the media size widget size select for default size.
{{Identical|Default}}

Label for the media size widget size select for scaled size. The expected input is a percentage - see [[MediaWiki:Visualeditor-mediasizewidget-label-scale/en]].
{{Identical|Scale}}
visualeditor-specialcharacter-button-too:
Tooltip text for the insert character button.
{{Identical|Special character}}
visualeditor-specialcharacterinspector-t:
Used as title for special character inspector.
{{Identical|Special character}}
visualeditor-table-format-data: Label for table cell data tool
visualeditor-table-format-header: Label for table cell header tool
visualeditor-table-insert-col-after: Label for insert column after tool
visualeditor-table-insert-col-before: Label for insert column before tool
visualeditor-table-insert-row-after: Label for insert row below tool
visualeditor-table-insert-row-before: Label for insert row above tool
visualeditor-table-insert-table:
Label for table insertion menu in the toolbar, for inserting parts of a table
{{Identical|Table}}
visualeditor-toolbar-table:
Label text for the 'table' menu in the toolbar of the tools to perform table operations.
{{Identical|Table}}
